### empty() {#a5dcab292efb44b438d13165d728289c3}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="bool llvm::remarks::RemarkLinker::empty () const"
  labels = {["inline"]}>
<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/check">Check</a> whether there are any remarks linked.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/remarks/remarklinker-h/#l00097">97</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/remarks/remarklinker-h">RemarkLinker.h</a>.

### link() {#ac548aeb7853ce7d7cd2a3b33fb761d1b}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Error RemarkLinker::link (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Buffer, std::optional&lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/remarks/#a6e038f443b9029221c590524f08be0be">Format</a> &gt; RemarkFormat=std::nullopt)</>}>
Link the remarks found in <code>Buffer</code>.

If <code>RemarkFormat</code> is not provided, try to deduce it from the metadata in <code>Buffer</code>. <code>Buffer</code> can be either a standalone remark container or just metadata. This takes care of uniquing and merging the remarks.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/remarks/remarklinker-h/#l00082">82</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/remarks/remarklinker-h">RemarkLinker.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/remarks/remarklinker-cpp/#l00069">69</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/remarks/remarklinker-cpp">RemarkLinker.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### link() {#a2f0b07de873627d24a364adbc61b0da3}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Error RemarkLinker::link (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/object/objectfile">object::ObjectFile</a> &amp; Obj, std::optional&lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/remarks/#a6e038f443b9029221c590524f08be0be">Format</a> &gt; RemarkFormat=std::nullopt)</>}>
Link the remarks found in <code>Obj</code> by looking for the right section and calling the method above.

### serialize() {#a520480e348343b25dce916ceca76dcd5}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Error RemarkLinker::serialize (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream">raw&#95;ostream</a> &amp; OS, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/remarks/#a6e038f443b9029221c590524f08be0be">Format</a> RemarksFormat) const</>}>
Serialize the linked remarks to the stream <code>OS</code>, using the format <code>RemarkFormat</code>.

This clears internal state such as the string table. Note: this implies that the serialization mode is standalone.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/remarks/remarklinker-h/#l00094">94</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/remarks/remarklinker-h">RemarkLinker.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/remarks/remarklinker-cpp/#l00117">117</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/remarks/remarklinker-cpp">RemarkLinker.cpp</a>.

### shouldKeepRemark() {#a689584b7d83c06c54030883084041679}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool llvm::remarks::RemarkLinker::shouldKeepRemark (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/remarks/remark">Remark</a> &amp; R)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Returns true if <code>R</code> should be kept.

If KeepAllRemarks is false, only return true if <code>R</code> has a valid debug location.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/remarks/remarklinker-h/#l00066">66</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/remarks/remarklinker-h">RemarkLinker.h</a>.

### Remarks {#a44626e555ad9e79a10df1d4b573e2f17}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>std::set&lt;std::unique&#95;ptr&lt;Remark&gt;, RemarkPtrCompare&gt; llvm::remarks::RemarkLinker::Remarks</>}>
A set holding unique remarks.

FIXME: std::set is probably not the most appropriate data structure here. Due to the limitation of having a move-only key, there isn&#39;t another obvious choice for now.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/remarks/remarklinker-h/#l00052">52</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/remarks/remarklinker-h">RemarkLinker.h</a>.

### StrTab {#af1d42a233044ca367f9fc9fb2af1df3d}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="StringTable llvm::remarks::RemarkLinker::StrTab">
The main string table for the remarks.

Note: all remarks should use the strings from this string table to avoid dangling references.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/remarks/remarklinker-h/#l00046">46</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/remarks/remarklinker-h">RemarkLinker.h</a>.
